messages:
Name: Václav Cerny
Nationality: Czechia
Date of Birth: October 17, 1997
Position: Midfielder
Current club: Wolfsburg
Bundesliga clubs played for: Wolfsburg
Václav Cerny is a midfielder at Wolfsburg who made an appearance in both of their Bundesliga matches so far in 2025/2026.
The last Bundesliga appearance that Cerny made came on August 31 for Wolfsburg versus Mainz 05; a meeting that he played 45 minutes in during a 1-1 draw.
Up next for Wolfsburg in Bundesliga action is a home match against Köln on September 13.
In last season's Premiership, Cerny played in 33 games for Rangers, scored 12 goals and provided four assists.
Cerny returned to Wolfsburg in July 2025 after a loan spell at Rangers, for whom he made 33 league appearances in total, scoring 12 goals and providing four assists.

The midfielder debuted in a Bundesliga fixture for Wolfsburg on August 19, 2023 as a starter versus Heidenheim aged 25 years and 306 days. Overall, in his Bundesliga career, he has appeared 24 times in the competition, with four goals and he is yet to assist a team-mate.
